channel.title: Welcome To Ibiza-Tropical Remake
channel.description:
Hello to all! I have finally posted a new song!
After three weeks since I haven‚Äôt posted a song, here it is! I‚Äôve tried to look at other users tracks to see what I‚Äôm missing to get better at making my tracks but I think I‚Äôll get there one day.
I‚Äôll also be making an introduction about myself on YouTube and how I got interested in music. This should help why I‚Äôm so poorly creative when it comes to music. Oh well.
The song was a remake off of DJ Tiesto song. (He does not use auxy, this was years ago.) I‚Äôve remade (on auxy) it and put a few kinks into the song. I will put the original song down also.
YouTube: [DJ Tiesto-Welcome to Ibiza](https://youtu.be/-JOlwVia1As)
SoundCloud: [Welcome To Ibiza-Tropical Remake](https://soundcloud.com/tropical_madman/welcome-to-ibiza-tropical)
Hope you guys have a great day! üëçüèª
I was going to do this post earlier but the auxy website closed and I didn‚Äôt get to post this on time. Please if you can, give me in information why this happened. Thank you.
Edit- Also @MR_ANDERSON how do you get your music to sound extremely good? It could help out for some new people on auxy to.

item.title: Welcome To Ibiza-Tropical Remake
item.dc:creator: Tropical_Madman
item.description:
Hello to all! I have finally posted a new song!

After three weeks since I haven‚Äôt posted a song, here it is! I‚Äôve tried to look at other users tracks to see what I‚Äôm missing to get better at making my tracks but I think I‚Äôll get there one day.

I‚Äôll also be making an introduction about myself on YouTube and how I got interested in music. This should help why I‚Äôm so poorly creative when it comes to music. Oh well.

The song was a remake off of DJ Tiesto song. (He does not use auxy, this was years ago.) I‚Äôve remade (on auxy) it and put a few kinks into the song. I will put the original song down also.

YouTube: DJ Tiesto-Welcome to Ibiza

SoundCloud: Welcome To Ibiza-Tropical Remake

Hope you guys have a great day!

I was going to do this post earlier but the auxy website closed and I didn‚Äôt get to post this on time. Please if you can, give me in information why this happened. Thank you.

Edit- Also @MR_ANDERSON how do you get your music to sound extremely good? It could help out for some new people on auxy to.
